till a lot later, huh, Darla?

00:24:04,839 --> 00:24:08,704
She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

249
00:24:08,778 --> 00:24:11,016
l don't have any dolls.

250
00:24:11,084 --> 00:24:14,316
Get some food, huh?

251
00:24:14,383 --> 00:24:17,254
Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

252
00:24:22,709 --> 00:24:26,257
- ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]

253
00:24:35,870 --> 00:24:38,971
Thirty, forty dollars.

254
00:24:40,674 --> 00:24:43,010
Who the fuck is this now?

255
00:24:43,075 --> 00:24:47,072
Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

256
00:24:47,143 --> 00:24:49,697
- Cerrado!
- [ Pounding ]

257
00:24:49,768 --> 00:24:53,448
Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

258
00:24:58,734 --> 00:25:00,678
[ Muttering ]

259
00:25:00,752 --> 00:25:04,846
Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

260
00:25:06,484 --> 00:25:08,143
Hey! Hey!

261
00:25:10,103 --> 00:25:12,112
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Screams ]

262
00:25:12,184 --> 00:25:16,377
''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

263
00:25:16,443 --> 00:25:20,221
gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

264
00:25:22,111 --> 00:25:24,317
What are you talking about?

265
00:25:24,385 --> 00:25:27,005
You heard me rapping, right?

266
00:25:27,075 --> 00:25:31,039
You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

267
00:25:33,352 --> 00:25:36,223
l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

268
00:25:36,297 --> 00:25:37,607
Gold.

269
00:25:37,675 --> 00:25:39,913
You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

270
00:25:44,015 --> 00:25:48,940
Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

271
00:25:49,011 --> 00:25:51,434
Shit on me.
Shit on me!

272
00:25:57,337 --> 00:25:59,509
- Aaah!
- Mr. Gideon.

273
00:25:59,579 --> 00:26:01,751
You're not paying attention.

274
00:26:04,542 --> 00:26:06,616
No! [ Screaming ]

275
00:26:06,687 --> 00:26:11,776
l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

276
00:26:13,349 --> 00:26:16,668
lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

277
00:26:19,273 --> 00:26:22,789
He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

278
00:26:22,860 --> 00:26:25,895
[ Helicopter Departing ]

279
00:26:27,887 --> 00:26:29,798
Who's this sack of shit?

280
00:26:29,873 --> 00:26:32,722
That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

281
00:26:32,786 --> 00:26:35,723
l think you can rule out
accidental death.

282
00:26:35,797 --> 00:26:38,482
Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

283
00:26:38,550 --> 00:26:42,547
This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

284
00:26:42,618 --> 00:26:47,160
Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

285
00:26:47,229 --> 00:26:49,085
l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

286
00:26:49,151 --> 00:26:52,765
Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

287
00:26:53,922 --> 00:26:56,225
What the hell
do you call that?

288
00:26:57,252 --> 00:26:59,741
l call it blood, detective.

289
00:26:59,814 --> 00:27:03,429
l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

290
00:27:03,497 --> 00:27:06,150
You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

291
00:27:06,219 --> 00:27:10,051
[ Helicopter Approaching ]

292
00:27:12,625 --> 00:27:15,409
- Warmer?
- What are you doing?

293
00:27:15,475 --> 00:27:17,997
- Don't you know this game?
- What game?

294
00:27:18,069 --> 00:27:20,854
Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

295
00:27:20,919 --> 00:27:25,145
They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

296
00:27:25,211 --> 00:27:30,517
Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

297
00:27:33,953 --> 00:27:36,443
- Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

298
00:27:45,225 --> 00:27:47,169
No, no.

299
00:27:47,243 --> 00:27:50,245
No, no, no.

300
00:27:52,622 --> 00:27:56,683
Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

301
00:28:00,436 --> 00:28:02,707
Shelly.

302
00:28:10,555 --> 00:28:11,898
l love you.

303
00:28:16,768 --> 00:28:19,519
[ Groaning ]

304
00:28:19,586 --> 00:28:22,402
- You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

305
00:28:22,468 --> 00:28:25,437
- Thank you.
- Take anything!

306
00:28:25,510 --> 00:28:28,262
Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

307
00:28:28,328 --> 00:28:30,850
the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

308
00:28:30,922 --> 00:28:33,225
The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

309
00:28:33,292 --> 00:28:38,183
T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

310
00:28:38,255 --> 00:28:41,127
- Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

311
00:28:41,202 --> 00:28:44,816
- A whole jolly club...
- Please!

312
00:28:44,884 --> 00:28:47,537
- with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

313
00:28:47,606 --> 00:28:50,161
- Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

314
00:28:51,769 --> 00:28:55,033
Each one of these is a life...

315
00:28:55,100 --> 00:28:57,523
a life you helped destroy.

316
00:28:57,597 --> 00:29:00,086
l'm begging you.
Don't kill me.

317
00:29:00,159 --> 00:29:03,707
l'm not gonna kill you.

318
00:29:03,778 --> 00:29:07,774
Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

319
00:29:07,845 --> 00:29:11,230
tonight.

320
00:29:16,075 --> 00:29:20,104
Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

321
00:29:21,935 --> 00:29:25,832
You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

322
00:29:25,905 --> 00:29:29,388
You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

323
00:29:29,460 --> 00:29:31,534
ls that gasoline l smell?

324
00:29:31,606 --> 00:29:34,423
No, man, no!
No!

325
00:29:34,488 --> 00:29:36,464
No!

326
00:29:36,537 --> 00:29:37,815
No!

327
00:29:40,732 --> 00:29:43,254
[ Screaming ]

328
00:29:46,433 --> 00:29:51,106
[ Screaming ]

329
00:29:52,869 --> 00:29:56,188
lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

330
00:29:56,263 --> 00:29:58,436
One root beer.

331
00:30:00,394 --> 00:30:03,014
[ Bartender ] l can't do anything.

332
00:30:03,084 --> 00:30:07,365
Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

333
00:30:07,440 --> 00:30:09,481
Yeah, way off.

334
00:30:10,610 --> 00:30:13,841
[ Tires Screeching, Door Opening ]

335
00:30:13,908 --> 00:30:18,614
Police! Don't move!
l said, ''Don't move!''

336
00:30:18,680 --> 00:30:21,584
l thought the police
always said, ''Freeze!''

337
00:30:21,658 --> 00:30:25,436
l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.

338
00:30:25,501 --> 00:30:30,458
And l say l'm dead and l move.

339
00:30:30,528 --> 00:30:33,694
Not one more step.
l'm serious.

340
00:30:33,762 --> 00:30:37,955
Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

341
00:30:38,022 --> 00:30:41,024
What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

342
00:30:41,096 --> 00:30:42,755
You high?

343
00:30:42,825 --> 00:30:45,893
- You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

344
00:30:45,963 --> 00:30:49,796
How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

345
00:30:49,870 --> 00:30:52,425
Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

346
00:30:52,496 --> 00:30:56,907
l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

347
00:30:56,979 --> 00:31:01,619
Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

348
00:31:01,687 --> 00:31:05,967
- lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.

349
00:31:06,042 --> 00:31:08,378
Do you know someone named T-bird?

350
00:31:08,444 --> 00:31:12,855
He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

351
00:31:12,927 --> 00:31:15,417
You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

352
00:31:15,489 --> 00:31:18,840
- [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

353
00:31:18,915 --> 00:31:24,069
- [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

354
00:31:24,135 --> 00:31:27,650
They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

355
00:31:27,721 --> 00:31:30,057
Get away from there!

356
00:31:30,124 --> 00:31:33,126
Cops!
Get outta here!

357
00:31:33,198 --> 00:31:36,462
- [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

358
00:31:41,619 --> 00:31:45,779
- Oh, great, great.
- [ Siren Wailing ]

359
00:31:45,847 --> 00:31:48,336
Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

360
00:31:48,408 --> 00:31:50,647
and you lose him
right out in the open.

361
00:31:50,715 --> 00:31:56,316
Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

362
00:31:56,382 --> 00:32:00,159
Little early
for Devil's Night.

363
00:32:01,666 --> 00:32:04,286
You are very restless.

364
00:32:04,356 --> 00:32:07,457
Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

365
00:32:07,526 --> 00:32:11,588
- Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

366
00:32:15,052 --> 00:32:17,541
[ Sizzling ]

367
00:32:17,614 --> 00:32:21,064
** [ Rock And Roll, lndistinct ]

368
00:32:22,610 --> 00:32:25,514
There are energies
aligning against you.

369
00:32:25,588 --> 00:32:27,956
Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

370
00:32:34,618 --> 00:32:38,265
[ Door Opening, Closing ]

371
00:32:38,333 --> 00:32:41,204
Mmm, yummy.

372
00:32:46,338 --> 00:32:50,138
Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

373
00:32:50,213 --> 00:32:53,314
Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

374
00:32:53,383 --> 00:32:55,075
l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

375
00:32:55,145 --> 00:32:57,699
[ Man ] You must be
awfully disappointed.

376
00:32:57,770 --> 00:33:00,969
l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

377
00:33:01,037 --> 00:33:03,243
- Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

378
00:33:03,311 --> 00:33:07,689
Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

379
00:33:07,762 --> 00:33:10,219
Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

380
00:33:10,292 --> 00:33:13,360
an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

381
00:33:15,928 --> 00:33:18,385
You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

382
00:33:18,457 --> 00:33:21,143
- Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

383
00:33:21,212 --> 00:33:23,897
That's very reassuring.

384
00:33:23,965 --> 00:33:27,830
l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

385
00:33:27,904 --> 00:33:32,185
ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?

386
00:33:32,259 --> 00:33:34,049
Call it my need to know.

387
00:33:59,896 --> 00:34:01,686
[ Sighing ]

388
00:34:03,802 --> 00:34:06,225
[ Honking, Tires Screeching ]

389
00:34:06,300 --> 00:34:08,790
Let go, you creep!

390
00:34:11,968 --> 00:34:13,660
- Nah.
- [ Laughing ]

391
00:34:13,730 --> 00:34:16,896
You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

392
00:34:18,245 --> 00:34:20,548
He couldn't have stopped.

393
00:34:20,615 --> 00:34:24,742
He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

394
00:34:24,810 --> 00:34:27,746
What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

395
00:34:27,819 --> 00:34:29,730
Sometimes.

396
00:34:31,727 --> 00:34:36,269
lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

397
00:34:37,395 --> 00:34:40,746
- lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

398
00:34:49,705 --> 00:34:52,707
[ Phone Ringing ]

399
00:34:57,007 --> 00:35:01,418
Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

400
00:35:01,490 --> 00:35:05,649
Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

401
00:35:05,717 --> 00:35:09,015
Annie... look at that.

402
00:35:09,079 --> 00:35:13,141
''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

403
00:35:13,211 --> 00:35:15,187
What is this, a petition?

404
00:35:15,260 --> 00:35:18,012
Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

405
00:35:18,078 --> 00:35:22,009
- The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

406
00:35:22,081 --> 00:35:27,748
Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

407
00:35:27,813 --> 00:35:31,231
The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

408
00:35:31,304 --> 00:35:35,136
- l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

409
00:35:41,872 --> 00:35:45,452
You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

410
00:35:45,522 --> 00:35:47,564
l'm cool.

411
00:35:47,636 --> 00:35:52,178
You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

412
00:35:52,247 --> 00:35:54,638
Ah, l owe you one!

413
00:35:54,713 --> 00:35:56,656
Yeah, right.

414
00:35:56,730 --> 00:35:58,804
Damn.

415
00:36:11,845 --> 00:36:15,164
** [ Rock And Roll ]

416
00:36:23,213 --> 00:36:26,925
Tomorrow night
we can get high...

417
00:36:26,992 --> 00:36:30,540
and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

418
00:36:33,268 --> 00:36:36,270
- * l am the park *
- [ Caws ]

419
00:36:36,342 --> 00:36:39,825
* l am glow *

420
00:36:39,897 --> 00:36:43,795
* ln the motherfuckin' dark *

421
00:36:43,869 --> 00:36:45,943
* l am shocked *

422
00:36:46,014 --> 00:36:48,154
* And l see *

423
00:36:48,223 --> 00:36:51,258
* l don't want to believe *

424
00:36:51,330 --> 00:36:54,332
* No more *

425
00:36:54,404 --> 00:36:56,926
- There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

426
00:36:56,998 --> 00:36:58,886
- Huh?
- [ Cawing ]

427
00:37:00,007 --> 00:37:02,792
- lt's a squab.
- [ Laughing ]

428
00:37:02,858 --> 00:37:05,380
Come here, bird.

429
00:37:05,452 --> 00:37:07,461
Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.

430
00:37:07,534 --> 00:37:09,772
Bird. B-B-Birdie.

431
00:37:09,839 --> 00:37:12,329
Here, birdie, birdie.

432
00:37:12,400 --> 00:37:15,272
Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.

433
00:37:17,781 --> 00:37:20,882
Birdie? Hey, birdie?

434
00:37:20,951 --> 00:37:23,440
Here, Funboy.

435
00:37:25,658 --> 00:37:27,547
What the fuck?

436
00:37:31,199 --> 00:37:33,622
[ Strumming Guitar ]

437
00:37:33,696 --> 00:37:38,042
No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

438
00:37:38,116 --> 00:37:40,190
Look at him.

439
00:37:40,261 --> 00:37:43,012
[ Funboy ] Don't sweat it.

440
00:37:44,649 --> 00:37:47,553
lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

441
00:37:55,152 --> 00:37:59,792
Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

442
00:38:01,716 --> 00:38:06,455
You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?

443
00:38:06,520 --> 00:38:09,905
You need professional help.

444
00:38:11,611 --> 00:38:14,101
- [ Groaning ]
- Bingo!

445
00:38:14,174 --> 00:38:16,696
He shoots! He scores!

446
00:38:18,784 --> 00:38:21,656
- [ Cawing ]
- [ Laughing ]

447
00:38:22,948 --> 00:38:26,365
[ Cheering, Laughing ]

448
00:38:26,438 --> 00:38:29,986
- Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?

449
00:38:30,056 --> 00:38:32,677
Stop me if you heard this one.

450
00:38:32,747 --> 00:38:35,563
Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

451
00:38:35,629 --> 00:38:37,485
[ Whimpering ]

452
00:38:37,550 --> 00:38:39,275
Ow.

453
00:38:40,753 --> 00:38:43,405
He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...

454
00:38:43,475 --> 00:38:46,892
Don't you ever fuckin' die?

455
00:38:46,965 --> 00:38:49,105
''Can you put me up for the night?''

456
00:38:49,174 --> 00:38:52,526
[ Groaning ]

457
00:38:54,394 --> 00:38:58,805
- Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

458
00:38:58,877 --> 00:39:00,853
Oh, God.

459
00:39:00,927 --> 00:39:04,858
Look what you've done
to my sheets.

460
00:39:06,691 --> 00:39:08,253
[ Gun Uncocking ]

461
00:39:14,409 --> 00:39:16,101
[ Crying ]

462
00:39:16,170 --> 00:39:19,587
[ Sobbing ]

463
00:39:28,115 --> 00:39:30,003
l've got a gun
in my pocket.

464
00:39:32,918 --> 00:39:35,538
You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

465
00:39:52,580 --> 00:39:56,292
Stay away!
Stay away from me!

466
00:39:57,704 --> 00:39:59,877
[ Screaming ]

467
00:40:03,852 --> 00:40:07,499
Look.

468
00:40:07,567 --> 00:40:11,880
Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

469
00:40:11,954 --> 00:40:16,529
Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

470
00:40:26,521 --> 00:40:31,129
Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

471
00:40:59,697 --> 00:41:03,213
lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!

472
00:41:03,284 --> 00:41:05,457
Now fill it up!

473
00:41:06,518 --> 00:41:09,750
Fill it up yourself, macho man.

474
00:41:09,817 --> 00:41:12,404
l really need this.

475
00:41:18,688 --> 00:41:20,576
All right.

476
00:41:20,641 --> 00:41:24,418
You burn yourself
playing with matches?

477
00:41:24,483 --> 00:41:26,973
- Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

478
00:41:27,045 --> 00:41:29,414
- Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

479
00:41:29,479 --> 00:41:32,296
This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

480
00:41:32,361 --> 00:41:35,046
Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

481
00:41:35,115 --> 00:41:38,413
Oh! Hey, hey, hon!

482
00:41:38,477 --> 00:41:41,262
Hey, good night, Darla.

483
00:41:43,601 --> 00:41:47,149
- You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

484
00:41:54,905 --> 00:41:58,224
Get away, steamhead.

485
00:42:14,119 --> 00:42:16,609
[ Groaning ]

486
00:42:16,681 --> 00:42:18,570
Shh.

487
00:42:28,114 --> 00:42:33,617
[ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

488
00:42:33,685 --> 00:42:36,305
- [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

489
00:42:36,375 --> 00:42:39,247
lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

490
00:42:39,322 --> 00:42:42,138
across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

491
00:42:42,204 --> 00:42:44,278
The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

492
00:42:44,350 --> 00:42:46,391
but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

493
00:42:46,463 --> 00:42:51,038
ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--

494
00:42:51,106 --> 00:42:53,923
Freeze!

495
00:42:53,988 --> 00:42:57,340
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

496
00:42:57,415 --> 00:42:59,303
[ Whispering ] Fuck.

497
00:43:01,193 --> 00:43:03,300
Good likeness.

498
00:43:03,371 --> 00:43:06,919
l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.

499
00:43:06,990 --> 00:43:09,163
You still have your hat on.

500
00:43:12,914 --> 00:43:14,923
l gotta sit down.

501
00:43:15,699 --> 00:43:17,556
Shi--

502
00:43:17,621 --> 00:43:20,372
[ Albrecht ] Holy Shit.

503
00:43:21,752 --> 00:43:24,307
Say...

504
00:43:24,378 --> 00:43:28,505
are you some kind of... ghost?

505
00:43:28,573 --> 00:43:30,462
Boo!

506
00:43:37,732 --> 00:43:42,110
l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

507
00:43:44,040 --> 00:43:47,938
You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.

508
00:43:48,011 --> 00:43:50,980
She, ah, was beaten and raped.

509
00:43:51,053 --> 00:43:55,464
Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

510
00:43:55,537 --> 00:43:58,059
Come on. Read the file.

511
00:43:58,130 --> 00:44:02,323
Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.

512
00:44:02,390 --> 00:44:05,458
Her body finally just gave it up.

513
00:44:05,528 --> 00:44:09,240
l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

514
00:44:18,721 --> 00:44:20,577
- Hey.
- Don't touch me!

515
00:44:20,643 --> 00:44:24,475
- [ Sobbing ]
- Hey.

516
00:44:25,830 --> 00:44:28,549
You okay?

517
00:44:28,616 --> 00:44:31,204
l saw her.

518
00:44:32,780 --> 00:44:35,946
l saw her
through your eyes.

519
00:44:36,014 --> 00:44:38,023
You stayed with her
the whole time.

520
00:44:38,095 --> 00:44:43,337
Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

521
00:44:43,411 --> 00:44:47,954
l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

522
00:44:48,023 --> 00:44:50,840
Give me something
l could work with.

523
00:44:50,905 --> 00:44:53,045
Yeah.

524
00:44:53,114 --> 00:44:55,450
Look, l--

525
00:44:55,516 --> 00:44:57,906
Why didn't you do
something about it?

526
00:44:57,982 --> 00:45:01,181
You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

527
00:45:01,248 --> 00:45:04,567
would talk after
what happened to you?

528
00:45:04,643 --> 00:45:07,744
l kept asking
questions and...

529
00:45:07,813 --> 00:45:10,368
finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

530
00:45:14,218 --> 00:45:16,107
This your wife?

531
00:45:16,171 --> 00:45:20,484
Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

532
00:45:22,256 --> 00:45:25,105
lt's funny.

533
00:45:25,170 --> 00:45:29,002
Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

534
00:45:29,077 --> 00:45:32,428
l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

535
00:45:32,503 --> 00:45:35,407
Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

536
00:45:44,640 --> 00:45:48,920
You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

537
00:45:53,414 --> 00:45:56,482
You going to vanish
into thin air again?

538
00:45:59,978 --> 00:46:02,566
l thought l'd use
your front door.

539
00:46:05,487 --> 00:46:11,088
Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

540
00:46:12,564 --> 00:46:14,802
Yeah.

541
00:46:19,160 --> 00:46:21,650
- [ Door Opening, Closing ]
- [ Whispering ] Yeah.

542
00:46:21,722 --> 00:46:25,107
[ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

543
00:46:25,181 --> 00:46:28,183
l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

544
00:46:28,255 --> 00:46:31,192
And then my business
gets blown up real good.

545
00:46:31,265 --> 00:46:34,366
- Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

546
00:46:34,435 --> 00:46:36,859
l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

547
00:46:36,934 --> 00:46:41,192
He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

548
00:46:41,256 --> 00:46:46,082
He winked at ya?
Musicians.

549
00:46:46,156 --> 00:46:48,524
- What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

550
00:46:48,590 --> 00:46:50,980
shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

551
00:46:51,055 --> 00:46:56,362
What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

552
00:46:56,435 --> 00:46:59,088
You ain't lost everything.

553
00:46:59,157 --> 00:47:04,049
Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

554
00:47:04,121 --> 00:47:07,571
Fair enough. Catch.

555
00:47:08,637 --> 00:47:10,973
Aah! Jesus.

556
00:47:11,038 --> 00:47:13,374
Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

557
00:47:13,440 --> 00:47:15,351
What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

558
00:47:15,425 --> 00:47:18,940
All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

559
00:47:19,011 --> 00:47:22,811
Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

560
00:47:22,887 --> 00:47:26,850
You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

561
00:47:26,921 --> 00:47:29,476
Yeah.

562
00:47:29,547 --> 00:47:34,504
Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

563
00:47:34,575 --> 00:47:37,709
Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

564
00:47:37,777 --> 00:47:40,976
My father's daughter.
That's right.

565
00:47:41,044 --> 00:47:44,112
What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

566
00:47:44,182 --> 00:47:46,355
Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

567
00:47:46,423 --> 00:47:49,778
With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

568
00:47:49,905 --> 00:47:53,224
He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

569
00:47:53,300 --> 00:47:56,564
He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

570
00:47:56,630 --> 00:47:58,770
Whatever the fuck that means.

571
00:47:58,840 --> 00:48:02,455
Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

572
00:48:03,515 --> 00:48:05,491
Want to relax
that thing now?

573
00:48:05,565 --> 00:48:10,041
This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

574
00:48:10,112 --> 00:48:14,305
You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?

575
00:48:14,372 --> 00:48:16,959
l ain't makin' all this up.

576
00:48:17,029 --> 00:48:21,375
l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

577
00:48:23,081 --> 00:48:25,123
All right.

578
00:48:29,583 --> 00:48:34,408
A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

579
00:48:34,482 --> 00:48:37,997
Yeah. [ Laughing ]

580
00:48:44,249 --> 00:48:47,121
For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

581
00:48:53,792 --> 00:48:55,997
Thanks.

582
00:48:56,065 --> 00:48:58,271
Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

583
00:48:58,339 --> 00:49:00,829
A big one.

584
00:49:00,901 --> 00:49:05,574
Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

585
00:49:05,641 --> 00:49:09,418
l'll have the janitor
come on up.

586
00:49:13,678 --> 00:49:15,752
[ Purring ]

587
00:49:15,824 --> 00:49:20,529
** [ Electric Guitar ]

588
00:49:31,547 --> 00:49:35,194
[ Siren Wailing ]

589
00:50:03,250 --> 00:50:08,621
- ** [ Rock Playing ]
- [ Crow Caws ]

590
00:50:08,694 --> 00:50:10,867
You again.

591
00:50:10,935 --> 00:50:13,206
You lost or hungry?

592
00:50:13,273 --> 00:50:15,959
- Hi.
- [ Caws ]

593
00:50:18,204 --> 00:50:20,060
* lt can't rain all the time *

594
00:50:20,126 --> 00:50:24,471
[ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

595
00:50:33,192 --> 00:50:35,779
[ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!

596
00:50:35,849 --> 00:50:38,666
One part falls, it all falls!

597
00:50:38,731 --> 00:50:42,050
- You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

598
00:50:42,126 --> 00:50:44,583
That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

599
00:50:44,656 --> 00:50:46,664
Tin Tin was a dick.

600
00:50:46,737 --> 00:50:49,609
Tin Tin.
Sheesh.

601
00:50:49,684 --> 00:50:53,713
Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

602
00:50:53,783 --> 00:50:55,639
Fire it up!

603
00:50:58,105 --> 00:51:00,114
No Funboy.

604
00:51:00,187 --> 00:51:03,964
Probably still...
bangin' away on Darla.

605
00:51:04,030 --> 00:51:06,847
- [ Grunting ]
- [ Whistles ]

606
00:51:09,121 --> 00:51:12,091
Smokes and road beers.
Be quick.

607
00:51:12,163 --> 00:51:14,074
l'm on it.

608
00:51:19,433 --> 00:51:24,522
[ Man Talking On Phone ]

609
00:51:24,589 --> 00:51:27,439
[ Sighs ]

610
00:51:31,473 --> 00:51:33,809
[ Cawing ]

611
00:51:43,514 --> 00:51:46,932
What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

612
00:51:47,005 --> 00:51:51,448
- [ Cawing ]
- l'm your passenger.

613
00:51:58,085 --> 00:52:00,126
Drive.

614
00:52:02,152 --> 00:52:04,969
[ Motor Starts ]

615
00:52:05,034 --> 00:52:06,759
What's all this
happy horseshit?

616
00:52:06,827 --> 00:52:08,868
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Hey, T-bird! T-bird!

617
00:52:08,940 --> 00:52:12,074
- [ Horn Honking ]
- [ Screams ]

618
00:52:12,143 --> 00:52:13,999
[ Brakes Screeching ]

619
00:52:14,064 --> 00:52:17,198
- Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

620
00:52:17,267 --> 00:52:21,099
Stupid asshair!
You hit my car!

621
00:52:21,173 --> 00:52:23,313
[ Groaning ]

622
00:52:27,802 --> 00:52:32,060
What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

623
00:52:33,599 --> 00:52:36,383
We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

624
00:52:36,448 --> 00:52:39,418
- This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

625
00:52:42,245 --> 00:52:46,274
You got that cream stuff?

626
00:52:46,344 --> 00:52:48,648
l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

627
00:52:50,187 --> 00:52:53,036
- What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

628
00:52:53,101 --> 00:52:55,207
[ Screaming ]

629
00:52:56,399 --> 00:52:59,118
Oh, look. Makin' us popular.

630
00:52:59,185 --> 00:53:01,773
When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

631
00:53:01,843 --> 00:53:07,062
[ Siren Wailing ]

632
00:53:07,127 --> 00:53:09,999
This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

633
00:53:12,411 --> 00:53:14,485
Turn.

634
00:53:15,773 --> 00:53:18,426
You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

635
00:53:18,495 --> 00:53:22,655
- Right? Huh?
- [ Crow Cawing ]

636
00:53:24,163 --> 00:53:26,532
[ Groans ]
Damn! Dead end!

637
00:53:26,597 --> 00:53:28,738
[ Cawing ]

638
00:53:31,720 --> 00:53:34,089
- [ Man ] Look out!
- [ Woman Screams ]

639
00:53:37,261 --> 00:53:39,401
Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

640
00:53:50,038 --> 00:53:54,132
- [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

641
00:53:54,201 --> 00:53:57,586
[ Siren Wailing ]

642
00:53:57,659 --> 00:54:00,028
Shit! Shit!

643
00:54:06,882 --> 00:54:10,430
Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

644
00:54:11,813 --> 00:54:15,132
T-bird!
l got you, man!

645
00:54:15,208 --> 00:54:17,511
- Shit!
- [ Screaming ]

646
00:54:21,132 --> 00:54:25,958
[ Groaning, Car Door Chiming ]

647
00:54:30,355 --> 00:54:32,561
[ T-bird ] Remember?
Yeah, l remember everything.

648
00:54:32,629 --> 00:54:35,730
But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

649
00:54:35,799 --> 00:54:38,452
What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

650
00:54:38,521 --> 00:54:41,490
You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

651
00:54:41,563 --> 00:54:43,637
We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

652
00:54:43,708 --> 00:54:46,842
She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

653
00:54:46,911 --> 00:54:50,361
And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

654
00:54:50,433 --> 00:54:53,731
into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

655
00:54:53,796 --> 00:54:56,930
lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

656
00:54:56,999 --> 00:55:01,704
What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

657
00:55:03,243 --> 00:55:05,033
Did you send us
these complaints?

658
00:55:06,669 --> 00:55:09,868
Come here!
''Abashed the devil stood.''

659
00:55:09,936 --> 00:55:12,207
Does it get you sweaty?

660
00:55:12,274 --> 00:55:17,263
l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

661
00:55:17,333 --> 00:55:21,259
l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

662
00:55:21,386 --> 00:55:25,186
You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

663
00:55:25,262 --> 00:55:28,559
This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

664
00:55:28,624 --> 00:55:30,895
We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

665
00:55:30,962 --> 00:55:35,242
[ Grunting, Muttering ]
T-bird--

666
00:55:35,317 --> 00:55:38,166
There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!

667
00:55:40,633 --> 00:55:44,629
- T-bird.
- [ T-bird Panting ]

668
00:55:44,699 --> 00:55:47,931
- [ Engine Revs ]
- ''Abashed the devil stood...

669
00:55:47,998 --> 00:55:50,815
and felt how awful goodness is.''

670
00:55:50,880 --> 00:55:53,664
''And felt how awful goodness is.''

671
00:55:58,213 --> 00:56:02,046
[ Tires Squealing ]

672
00:56:07,148 --> 00:56:09,637
[ Gasping ]
T-bird. T-bird.

673
00:56:36,257 --> 00:56:39,423
[ Crow Caws ]

674
00:56:57,968 --> 00:57:00,174
[ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

675
00:57:00,242 --> 00:57:02,480
For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

676
00:57:02,548 --> 00:57:06,741
has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

677
00:57:06,807 --> 00:57:10,104
the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

678
00:57:10,169 --> 00:57:15,323
Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

679
00:57:15,389 --> 00:57:20,346
Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

680
00:57:20,417 --> 00:57:23,899
The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

681
00:57:23,971 --> 00:57:27,618
Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

682
00:57:29,575 --> 00:57:32,195
What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

683
00:57:32,265 --> 00:57:37,004
- Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

684
00:57:37,069 --> 00:57:41,033
So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

685
00:57:41,104 --> 00:57:44,302
So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

686
00:57:44,371 --> 00:57:49,262
Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

687
00:57:49,333 --> 00:57:54,869
- Who?
- Oh, it was nuts.

688
00:57:54,938 --> 00:57:59,961
You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

689
00:58:02,368 --> 00:58:06,494
Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

690
00:58:06,563 --> 00:58:08,669
Over easy.

691
00:58:10,693 --> 00:58:15,203
l like 'em
over easy... Mom.

692
00:58:25,360 --> 00:58:27,533
Hey, Albrecht.

693
00:58:27,602 --> 00:58:30,091
[ Sighs ]

694
00:58:30,163 --> 00:58:32,980
This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

695
00:58:33,045 --> 00:58:36,179
We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

696
00:58:36,248 --> 00:58:40,310
- We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

697
00:58:40,379 --> 00:58:42,235
Arson was his specialty.

698
00:58:42,300 --> 00:58:44,189
Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

699
00:58:44,253 --> 00:58:48,031
- Case closed.
- Bull-fuckin'-shit.

700
00:58:48,096 --> 00:58:50,269
Come here.

701
00:58:53,860 --> 00:58:55,771
You're holding out on me.

702
00:58:55,846 --> 00:58:59,231
l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

703
00:58:59,305 --> 00:59:02,438
and you're covering up
for somebody.

704
00:59:02,506 --> 00:59:04,842
Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

705
00:59:04,909 --> 00:59:08,654
- You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

706
00:59:08,719 --> 00:59:10,760
Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

707
00:59:10,833 --> 00:59:13,585
who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

708
00:59:13,651 --> 00:59:16,500
Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

709
00:59:16,565 --> 00:59:18,421
and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

710
00:59:18,486 --> 00:59:20,691
- Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

711
00:59:20,760 --> 00:59:22,703
l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.

712
00:59:22,777 --> 00:59:24,666
You gotta write that shit down.

713
00:59:24,731 --> 00:59:26,587
All right, smart-ass.

714
00:59:26,652 --> 00:59:29,589
The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

715
00:59:29,662 --> 00:59:33,440
- Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

716
00:59:33,505 --> 00:59:37,086
- For what?
- Misconduct.

717
00:59:37,156 --> 00:59:41,021
[ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

718
00:59:41,094 --> 00:59:45,505
[ Thunder Rumbling ]

719
00:59:55,345 --> 00:59:57,201
[ Grunting ]

720
01:00:22,340 --> 01:00:26,085
** [ Electric Guitar ]

721
01:00:29,706 --> 01:00:32,196
[ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

722
01:00:32,268 --> 01:00:34,986
- Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

723
01:00:39,825 --> 01:00:43,472
Dancing--

724
01:00:53,307 --> 01:00:55,927
[ Paper Ripping ]

725
01:01:13,353 --> 01:01:15,209
Eric?

726
01:01:15,274 --> 01:01:17,764
[ Rain Falling ]

727
01:01:17,837 --> 01:01:21,931
[ Sighs ] Man, Sarah,
you're going crazy.

728
01:01:21,999 --> 01:01:24,816
- Gabriel.
- [ Meows ]

729
01:01:24,881 --> 01:01:27,534
l thought you were dead.

730
01:01:27,604 --> 01:01:30,737
You're not dead, are you?

731
01:01:54,503 --> 01:01:57,320
l knew it was you.

732
01:01:59,147 --> 01:02:01,963
Even with the makeup.

733
01:02:06,608 --> 01:02:09,097
l remembered your song.

734
01:02:09,170 --> 01:02:12,784
You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''

735
01:02:12,852 --> 01:02:15,986
That is from your song, right?

736
01:02:25,502 --> 01:02:28,504
- [ Cawing ]
- Come on, Eric. l know you're here.

737
01:02:30,785 --> 01:02:34,716
l miss you...
and Shelly.

738
01:02:37,670 --> 01:02:40,968
Get so lonely
all by myself.

739
01:02:42,762 --> 01:02:47,205
The hell with you.
l thought you cared.

740
01:02:47,277 --> 01:02:50,279
Sarah, l do care.

741
01:03:01,036 --> 01:03:03,077
That's him.
That's him!

742
01:03:03,150 --> 01:03:06,349
But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

743
01:03:06,416 --> 01:03:09,550
l seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

744
01:03:09,619 --> 01:03:12,076
Then he took him away.
But l chased him down.

745
01:03:12,149 --> 01:03:14,834
And he flash fried T-bird
to his fuckin' car!

746
01:03:14,902 --> 01:03:18,287
Aw, T-bird!
Here's to you, buddy.

747
01:03:18,361 --> 01:03:22,139
Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

748
01:03:23,388 --> 01:03:27,799
- Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

749
01:03:27,872 --> 01:03:30,362
- Empty.
- Fire it--

750
01:03:30,434 --> 01:03:32,290
Grave?
What grave?

751
01:03:32,355 --> 01:03:34,495
What about
my fuckin' grave?

752
01:03:34,564 --> 01:03:35,842
- [ Screams ]
- Three out of four.

753
01:03:35,910 --> 01:03:39,043
He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

754
01:03:39,112 --> 01:03:41,666
lt's not fair.
lt's Funboy's fault.

755
01:03:41,737 --> 01:03:44,773
That boy was out of control.
T-bird, he came in, he says...
[ Whistles ]

756
01:03:44,844 --> 01:03:48,010
...''Waste them both.'' And now
this ghost gonna kill my ass next!

757
01:03:48,078 --> 01:03:51,823
[ Groaning ]

758
01:03:51,889 --> 01:03:54,859
This ghost gonna
kill my ass next.

759
01:03:54,932 --> 01:03:58,546
- This ghost gonna kill--
- Hey.

760
01:03:58,614 --> 01:04:00,503
That ain't no ghost.

761
01:04:02,328 --> 01:04:05,364
- They have all arrived.
- Watch him.

762
01:04:05,435 --> 01:04:07,346
We might need him.

763
01:04:08,797 --> 01:04:11,133
Ghost gonna kill my--

764
01:04:23,368 --> 01:04:27,145
He like his plain
or with onions?

765
01:04:27,211 --> 01:04:30,508
Fine.
Don't talk to me.

766
01:04:30,573 --> 01:04:34,505
When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

767
01:04:34,576 --> 01:04:37,065
That's what l thought.

768
01:04:37,138 --> 01:04:39,791
Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

769
01:04:39,860 --> 01:04:42,033
You'll just think
l'm nuts.

770
01:04:42,102 --> 01:04:45,552
Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.

771
01:04:45,624 --> 01:04:50,778
- You see him too?
- l saw somebody.

772
01:04:50,844 --> 01:04:54,195
Maybe it was
your fairy godfather.

773
01:04:54,270 --> 01:04:57,087
Eric didn't come back for me.

774
01:04:57,152 --> 01:05:01,727
He can't be my friend anymore
because l'm alive.

775
01:05:01,796 --> 01:05:04,864
You want a friend
to walk you home?

776
01:05:04,934 --> 01:05:09,956
** [ Electric Guitar ]

777
01:05:34,139 --> 01:05:37,010
- [ Screaming ]
- * l am the wicked
l am the wave of the future *

778
01:05:49,574 --> 01:05:51,430
[ Woman ] * Being crucified *

779
01:05:51,495 --> 01:05:55,622
* You things, things
things of the flesh *

780
01:05:55,690 --> 01:05:58,278
* Do it slow *

781
01:05:58,349 --> 01:06:02,476
* Down avenues ''cut me'' *

782
01:06:02,544 --> 01:06:06,092
* Lust my eyes *

783
01:06:06,162 --> 01:06:12,179
* Licking lips encouraging
Mr. Careworn *

784
01:06:12,247 --> 01:06:18,132
* To gaze upon the screen bask on *

785
01:06:18,203 --> 01:06:20,146
* After the flesh **

786
01:06:31,653 --> 01:06:35,103
[ Whimpering ]

787
01:06:35,175 --> 01:06:37,992
Boys.

788
01:06:38,057 --> 01:06:41,355
lt seems our friend T-bird won't be
joining us this evening...

789
01:06:41,420 --> 01:06:43,429
on account of
a slight case of death.

790
01:06:43,502 --> 01:06:45,390
- [ Men Chuckling ]
- You wanna sit down?

791
01:06:45,455 --> 01:06:50,608
- [ Groaning ]
- Well, well, well.

792
01:06:50,675 --> 01:06:53,611
Devil's Night is
upon us again.

793
01:06:53,684 --> 01:06:55,540
l thought we'd throw
a little party...

794
01:06:55,606 --> 01:06:58,739
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

795
01:06:58,808 --> 01:07:00,949
l like the pretty lights.

796
01:07:01,018 --> 01:07:03,769
[ Laughing ]

797
01:07:03,835 --> 01:07:07,580
Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what l'm saying?

798
01:07:07,647 --> 01:07:12,636
- That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong. Best reason to quit.

799
01:07:12,706 --> 01:07:15,010
Only reason to quit.

800
01:07:15,076 --> 01:07:20,350
A man has an idea.

801
01:07:20,423 --> 01:07:22,596
The idea attracts others...

802
01:07:22,665 --> 01:07:24,674
like-minded.

803
01:07:24,747 --> 01:07:26,756
The idea expands.

804
01:07:26,829 --> 01:07:30,344
The idea becomes
an institution.

805
01:07:30,415 --> 01:07:32,970
What was the idea?

806
01:07:33,041 --> 01:07:36,655
See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

807
01:07:36,724 --> 01:07:39,409
But l'll tell ya, when l used
to think about the idea itself...

808
01:07:39,478 --> 01:07:42,447
it'd put a big old smile on my face.

809
01:07:42,519 --> 01:07:44,626
You see, gentlemen...

810
01:07:44,697 --> 01:07:49,490
greed is for amateurs.

811
01:07:49,565 --> 01:07:54,554
Disorder, chaos, anarchy...

812
01:07:54,625 --> 01:07:57,114
now that's fun!

813
01:07:57,186 --> 01:07:59,392
- What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

814
01:07:59,460 --> 01:08:02,724
l started the first fires
in this goddamn city.

815
01:08:02,791 --> 01:08:05,760
Before l knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.

816
01:08:05,832 --> 01:08:09,130
Do you know
what they got now?

817
01:08:09,195 --> 01:08:13,289
Devil's Night greeting cards.

818
01:08:13,359 --> 01:08:16,175
lsn't that precious?

819
01:08:16,241 --> 01:08:18,249
Yeah.

820
01:08:18,321 --> 01:08:22,896
The idea has become
the institution, boys.

821
01:08:22,966 --> 01:08:24,909
Time to move along.

822
01:08:24,983 --> 01:08:27,319
You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

823
01:08:27,384 --> 01:08:29,775
No.

824
01:08:29,850 --> 01:08:32,339
No, l want you to set
a fire so goddamn big...

825
01:08:32,412 --> 01:08:35,382
the gods will notice us again.
That's what l'm saying.

826
01:08:35,455 --> 01:08:37,944
l want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye...

827
01:08:38,016 --> 01:08:42,274
one more time and say,
''Are we having fun or what?''

828
01:08:42,339 --> 01:08:44,347
- Hey, you! What's your name?
- Huh?

829
01:08:44,420 --> 01:08:46,277
Skank!
You don't feel that?

830
01:08:46,342 --> 01:08:49,508
- l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.
- [ All Laughing ]

831
01:08:49,576 --> 01:08:51,879
''l feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

832
01:08:51,946 --> 01:08:56,171
Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you!

833
01:08:56,237 --> 01:08:58,475
- [ Crow Caws ]
- [ Gasps ]

834
01:08:58,543 --> 01:09:01,065
How the hell did
that thing get in here?

835
01:09:02,406 --> 01:09:04,797
- Gentlemen.
- [ Skank Screams ]

836
01:09:04,872 --> 01:09:09,316
[ Skank Whimpering ] Let me go!
Let me go! l gotta go!

837
01:09:13,711 --> 01:09:17,325
You're him, huh?
The avenger.

838
01:09:17,393 --> 01:09:19,784
The killer of killers.

839
01:09:19,859 --> 01:09:22,578
- Nice outfit.
- [ Whimpering ]

840
01:09:22,645 --> 01:09:24,621
l'm not sure
about the face though.

841
01:09:24,695 --> 01:09:26,671
l just want him.

842
01:09:26,744 --> 01:09:30,041
- [ Whimpering ]
- Well, you can't have him.

843
01:09:30,107 --> 01:09:32,661
Well...

844
01:09:34,654 --> 01:09:37,022
l see you have
made your decision.

845
01:09:38,528 --> 01:09:40,439
Now let's see you enforce it.

846
01:09:40,514 --> 01:09:44,030
Aw, this is already boring the shit
out of me. Kill him!

847
01:09:49,673 --> 01:09:53,450
Ooh, that had to hurt.

848
01:09:53,516 --> 01:09:56,201
- [ All Laughing ]
- Well, that's that.

849
01:09:56,269 --> 01:09:59,305
- [ Laughing Continues ]
- That guy was crazy.

850
01:10:01,553 --> 01:10:04,272
[ Caws ]

851
01:10:05,684 --> 01:10:07,409
He's gone.
[ Screams ]

852
01:10:07,477 --> 01:10:12,915
[ Screaming, Gunfire ]

853
01:10:15,131 --> 01:10:16,757
Get him!

854
01:10:22,016 --> 01:10:25,313
- [ Whimpering ]
- [ Gunfire ]

855
01:10:33,352 --> 01:10:36,005
Right here! Here, help me!
He's gonna kill me!

856
01:10:39,917 --> 01:10:41,828
Jesus Christ!

857
01:10:57,593 --> 01:10:59,482
Hey!

858
01:11:30,673 --> 01:11:32,911
You're all going to die.

859
01:11:43,867 --> 01:11:47,252
[ Screaming ]

860
01:11:47,326 --> 01:11:50,045
[ Man ] Get the fuck outta here!

861
01:12:01,832 --> 01:12:04,289
[ Crowd Screaming ]

862
01:12:04,362 --> 01:12:09,636
[ Whimpering, Gasping ]

863
01:12:14,065 --> 01:12:18,825
[ Whimpering ]

864
01:12:18,900 --> 01:12:20,330
[ Screams ]

865
01:12:24,376 --> 01:12:27,193
Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

866
01:12:27,258 --> 01:12:30,359
l'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there.

867
01:12:30,428 --> 01:12:34,173
- Skank's dead.
- That's right.

868
01:12:34,239 --> 01:12:35,964
[ Screaming ] No!

869
01:12:36,032 --> 01:12:40,313
[ Whimpering ]

870
01:12:40,387 --> 01:12:43,903
- [ Body Crashing ]
- What in the crap--

871
01:12:45,191 --> 01:12:47,713
- Don't move!
- Hold it!

872
01:12:47,785 --> 01:12:51,083
That's all she wrote!
Move and we shoot!

873
01:12:57,680 --> 01:12:59,754
[ Siren Blaring ]

874
01:12:59,826 --> 01:13:02,577
You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

875
01:13:02,644 --> 01:13:05,810
[ Gunfire Continues ]

876
01:13:05,878 --> 01:13:09,361
- Stop running immediately.
- Holy shit!

877
01:13:09,433 --> 01:13:11,474
...arms and legs--

878
01:13:16,831 --> 01:13:21,406
Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

879
01:14:00,414 --> 01:14:04,858
- [ Tires Screeching ]
- Come on! Move it!

880
01:14:09,092 --> 01:14:12,094
My advice:
Next time duck.

881
01:14:14,056 --> 01:14:16,326
So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away donuts.

882
01:14:16,394 --> 01:14:19,592
- [ Sirens Wailing ]
- [ Brakes Screeching ]

883
01:14:19,660 --> 01:14:22,629
- Shit!
- [ Door Opening ]

884
01:14:25,424 --> 01:14:28,208
Oh. l knew you
were gonna do that.

885
01:14:28,274 --> 01:14:30,643
Look at that out there.

886
01:14:30,707 --> 01:14:33,524
The whole city oughta be
in flames by now.

887
01:14:33,589 --> 01:14:36,657
Sky oughta be red.

888
01:14:36,727 --> 01:14:40,887
So that, l take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

889
01:14:40,955 --> 01:14:46,426
He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

890
01:14:46,495 --> 01:14:49,344
- l like him already.
- The crow...

891
01:14:49,409 --> 01:14:53,722
is his link between
the land of the living...

892
01:14:53,796 --> 01:14:56,034
and the realm of the dead.

893
01:14:56,102 --> 01:15:00,447
So, kill the crow
and destroy the man.

894
01:15:00,521 --> 01:15:02,410
Hmm.

895
01:15:24,603 --> 01:15:26,514
l'm coming home, Shelly.

896
01:15:26,588 --> 01:15:28,694
[ Laughing ]

897
01:15:28,765 --> 01:15:34,236
[ Laughing Continues ]

898
01:15:34,306 --> 01:15:36,195
[ Chuckles ]

899
01:15:40,294 --> 01:15:44,323
[ Children Laughing, Hooting ]

900
01:15:44,393 --> 01:15:48,487
[ Laughing ]

901
01:16:13,630 --> 01:16:15,966
You're gonna say
l shouldn't be in the cemetery...

902
01:16:16,031 --> 01:16:18,007
in the middle
of the night, right?

903
01:16:18,081 --> 01:16:19,773
Safest place in the world to be.

904
01:16:19,842 --> 01:16:24,417
lt's 'cause everybody's dead.
l knew you'd come here.

905
01:16:24,485 --> 01:16:28,482
lt's really late, Sarah.

906
01:16:28,553 --> 01:16:31,204
You didn't say good-bye.

907
01:16:31,331 --> 01:16:35,131
You're just gonna have
to forgive me for that.

908
01:16:35,207 --> 01:16:39,268
And you're never coming back.

909
01:16:45,326 --> 01:16:48,427
l gave this to Shelly once.

910
01:16:52,018 --> 01:16:54,835
l think she'd like you
to have it.

911
01:16:58,743 --> 01:17:00,916
This way you'll
always remember her.

912
01:17:00,985 --> 01:17:03,442
l'll never take it off.

913
01:17:20,872 --> 01:17:24,551
l better go sneak
back in the house.

914
01:17:30,414 --> 01:17:32,303
Bye.

915
01:17:51,485 --> 01:17:54,204
- [ Muffled Screaming ]
- Shh! Shh!

916
01:17:56,033 --> 01:17:58,336
Shh. Take it easy, sweetheart.

917
01:17:58,402 --> 01:18:03,010
[ Muffled Screaming Continues ]

918
01:18:04,999 --> 01:18:07,368
Come on.
Come on.

919
01:18:20,114 --> 01:18:24,078
What is that? Some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

920
01:18:25,622 --> 01:18:28,592
l'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say, hmm?

921
01:18:34,781 --> 01:18:37,947
Her eyes are so innocent.

922
01:18:48,839 --> 01:18:50,695
- [ Sarah ] Eric!
- [ Caws ]

923
01:18:50,761 --> 01:18:54,560
Eric, help! Eric!

924
01:18:57,998 --> 01:19:00,967
[ Thunderclap ]

925
01:19:02,929 --> 01:19:04,785
[ Crow Caws ]

926
01:19:18,173 --> 01:19:20,279
[ Crow Flapping, Caws ]

927
01:19:32,391 --> 01:19:35,492
Quick impression for ya.

928
01:19:35,561 --> 01:19:39,142
Caw! Caw! Bang!
Fuck, l'm dead!

929
01:19:39,212 --> 01:19:42,411
Give me the girl
and l'll let you walk out of here.

930
01:19:42,478 --> 01:19:45,415
[ lnhales ]
Well, well.

931
01:19:45,488 --> 01:19:49,103
Why don't you just give me a minute
to think about that, huh?

932
01:19:53,366 --> 01:19:55,702
[ Cawing ]

933
01:19:56,728 --> 01:19:58,933
Nah. Fuck it.

934
01:20:04,702 --> 01:20:06,973
[ Chuckles ]

935
01:20:07,039 --> 01:20:09,113
Aw, fuck.

936
01:20:12,195 --> 01:20:15,995
[ Muffled Screaming ]

937
01:20:16,070 --> 01:20:20,416
Well, well, well. lt does seem to me
that our little life has undergone...

938
01:20:20,489 --> 01:20:24,201
a rather significant change in the past
few minutes now. Wouldn't you agree?

939
01:20:24,268 --> 01:20:28,265
[ Groaning ]

940
01:20:28,335 --> 01:20:31,599
Well, for a ghost,
you bleed just fine.

941
01:20:34,995 --> 01:20:37,168
- lt's still alive.
- Well, then kill it!

942
01:20:38,742 --> 01:20:40,882
Bye-bye, birdie.

943
01:21:24,151 --> 01:21:26,160
Ah, shit.

944
01:21:26,233 --> 01:21:28,242
Well, just came by
to pay my respects...

945
01:21:28,314 --> 01:21:30,258
and here you are
getting all shot up again.

946
01:21:30,332 --> 01:21:32,821
- They've taken Sarah.
- How many?

947
01:21:32,893 --> 01:21:34,804
Two more.
[ Groans ]

948
01:21:34,879 --> 01:21:36,790
l can handle it.
Don't worry.

949
01:21:36,865 --> 01:21:39,288
l'm not worried.
Look, here's the plan.

950
01:21:39,362 --> 01:21:42,015
You stay in front, and when they
run out of ammo, l'll arrest 'em.

951
01:21:42,085 --> 01:21:45,665
That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

952
01:21:48,168 --> 01:21:51,586
Oh, shit.
You're bleeding all over the place.

953
01:21:51,659 --> 01:21:53,635
l thought, you know,
you were invincible.

954
01:21:53,709 --> 01:21:57,028
l was.
l'm not anymore.

955
01:21:57,104 --> 01:22:01,165
[ Sighs ] Well, l guess you really will
need my help, won't you?

956
01:22:01,234 --> 01:22:04,018
- Come on.
- [ Groaning ]

957
01:22:06,582 --> 01:22:08,558
You take that.

958
01:22:37,420 --> 01:22:40,739
- You were supposed to stay behind me.
- l think l messed up.

959
01:23:01,982 --> 01:23:03,805
[ Crow Caws ]

960
01:23:03,871 --> 01:23:06,972
This is all the power
you ever had.

961
01:23:07,041 --> 01:23:09,050
Now it is mine.

962
01:23:09,123 --> 01:23:12,671
Pity there's not more time...

963
01:23:12,742 --> 01:23:15,264
- [ Gun Cocks ]
- ...for us.

964
01:23:16,648 --> 01:23:22,151
[ Woman Screaming ]

965
01:23:23,758 --> 01:23:27,536
[ Screaming ]

966
01:23:28,785 --> 01:23:32,585
[ Screaming Continues ]

967
01:23:32,661 --> 01:23:35,412
[ Sarah ] Help, Eric!
l'm scared!

968
01:23:37,431 --> 01:23:39,888
Let me go!

969
01:23:48,608 --> 01:23:51,992
Let her go!

970
01:23:52,066 --> 01:23:54,854
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

971
01:23:54,854 --> 01:23:56,481
You can have me.
l won't fight you.

972
01:23:56,551 --> 01:23:58,462
All right.

973
01:23:58,537 --> 01:24:00,480
- [ Sarah Screams ]
- No!

974
01:24:04,141 --> 01:24:09,262
[ Gasping, Groaning ]

975
01:24:11,442 --> 01:24:13,419
[ Crow Caws ]

976
01:24:13,491 --> 01:24:15,762
[ Thunderclap ]

977
01:24:15,829 --> 01:24:18,068
[ Gasping ]

978
01:24:18,136 --> 01:24:20,177
- [ Thunderclap ]
- [ Screams ]

979
01:24:39,046 --> 01:24:41,798
[ Swords Clanking ]

980

989

990

991

992

to you...

993

you have put

994

of spirit, son.

995
01:25:49,081 --> 01:25:51,571

l am going to miss you.

996

1005

1007

1008

What you kept in here

1009

l've been meaning
to come to church anyway.

1011

Oh, yuck.
[ Spits ]

1012

l'm quitting as of now...

1015

Eric?
